attributes.action: Vauxhall compensate the ZAFIRA owners for devaluation due to safety concerns
attributes.background: The first recorded safety case in a Zafira B was on the 11th February 2009, and the last recorded fire safety case was on the  3rd of July. at it was after the first recall was made last year.

rejection.details: This is a commercial decision for Vauxhall, unless you have a contractual claim against the company.
